content:
The R' Elyakim Uri (Uhr) Family


_____________________________________________________________________
Date: Fri, 3 Aug 2001 09:52:11 -0700 (PDT) 
From: joel rubin <sighet2000@yahoo.com> 
To: MOISHE@LANGSAM.COM 


DEAR MOISHE:

I WAS VERY HAPPY TO FIND THE MILLER/SPIRA SITE 

AND I THINK I CAN HELP YOU WITH INFORMATION ON R' ELYUKIEM THE SON OF RABBI 
YAKOV URI THE SON IN -LAW OF THE BNEI YESOSCHER

I HAVE A GRANDFATHER NAMED R' ELYUKIM UHR {URI} IF HE HIS THE SAME GUY I CAN 
HELP YOU WITH INFORMATION 

JOEL RUBIN



JOEL RUBIN
_____________________________________________________________________
Date: Wed, 01 Aug 2001 22:50:33 -0400
To: joel rubin <sighet2000@yahoo.com>
From: "moishe@langsam.com" <moishe@langsam.com>
Subject: Uri Family

Hi,

There is a definite chance that they are one and the same, or named after the 
same. Can you tell me more about your grandfather's heritage? Where and when 
he was born? his parent's names? Where he lived? etc? 

I will be away now for 2 weeks, so I will look for your response when I return.

Thanks for taking the time to contact me!
-Moishe
_____________________________________________________________________
Date: Tue, 7 Aug 2001 10:15:12 -0700 (PDT) 
From: joel rubin <sighet2000@yahoo.com> 
Subject: uri {uhr} family tree 
To: moishe@langsam.com 


DEAR MOISHE:

As i was analyzing the "SPIRA" family tree, i was delighted to find the family 
of reb YAAKOV URI,you mentioned "ELYUKIM" as one of r' yaakov's sons,but you 
had no additional information on him.

Being that i had a great-grandfather wite the name of r' ELYUKIM UHR, which 
was a grandchild of r' TZVI ELIMEILICH SPIRA, the famous "bnei yisoscher", we 
might even be talking about the very same person!   I'll be more then glad to 
share his history with you, and i would be very appreciative if you could halp 
me with some information in return.

ELYUKIM URI was born between the years of 1835-1845, to his father ? (whose 
information i'm missing), in the galicia part of poland, there he grew up, 
married his first wife with whom he raised a family, unfortunately, his wife 
passed away at early stage, and he remarried HINDA the daughter of r' ISSAC 
PREISS from "KOSICE" .{i don't remember if she was a widow or still a girl} 
when r' ELYUKIM remarried he moved to KOSICE, which was near or a part of 
HUNGARY and because of that he changed his surename from "URI" to "UHR", 
which means an emperor in hungarian language, he had three children with his 
wife HINDA {one of them was my g.g.mother named RACHEL who married my 
g.g.father r' PINCHAS TZVI RUBIN, they had about 9-10 children & they both 
where killed in the gas chambers in auchswitz by nazi germeny}, reb ELYUKIM 
passed away at the age of about "80" between the years of 1915-1925 and was 
buried in kosice. His wife passed away on DEC.10 1937 and she to was buried 
in kosice. In fact I even have a photograph of her tomestone where she is 
mentioed as" wife of famous rabbi elyukim uhr".

Also, while doing research, I once came across of the jewish cemetery listing 
in KOSICE, among the many people buried there,was:UHR ILIAS, AUGUST 3 1919, 
AGE 80, It was my assumption that it may have been ELYUKIM UHR.{here is the 
address take a look at it:}

http://www.kosice.sk/history/zidovsky/jew_ux.htm 

Hastly, I would like to know how you obtained the information that ELYUKIM was 
a son of r' YAAKOV, and if you would think it is the same ELYUKIM I'm talking 
about

                                                            GOOD LUCK!

                                                            sincerely yours

                                                            JOEL RUBIN
_____________________________________________________________________
Date: Mon, 20 Aug 2001 21:52:39 -0400
To: joel rubin <sighet2000@yahoo.com>
From: "moishe@langsam.com" <moishe@langsam.com>
Subject: Re: uri {uhr} family tree
Bcc: moishe@langsam.com

Hi,

Thanks for your inquiry. I apologize for the delay but I was out of town the 
last two weeks. I will more fully answer your letter shortly. Do you have any 
of your family in GEDCOM (or Family Tree Maker) format?

-Moishe
moishe@langsam.com

www.langsam.com
_____________________________________________________________________
Date: Tue, 21 Aug 2001 23:16:37 -0400
To: joel rubin <sighet2000@yahoo.com>
From: "moishe@langsam.com" <moishe@langsam.com>
Subject: Re: uri {uhr} family tree

Dear Joel,

Thanks for your extensive information. Can you elaborate some more? I feel 
there is a definite connection here. 

The Elyakim name comes from a sefer "Bais Avrohm". What is your mailing 
address, so I can send you a copy?

Can you tell me how many children Elaykim had with his first wife? What 
was her name? The children's names? 

What were the names of Hinda's other two children? What is your exact 
lineage from Rachel?

Have you seen the page at
http://www.ics.uci.edu/~dan/genealogy/Miller/spira/uri.htm

Should I write to the Kosice archives and request the death record of 
Ilias Uhr? 

-Moishe
moishe@langsam.com
_____________________________________________________________________
Date: Fri, 24 Aug 2001 09:04:09 -0700 (PDT) 
From: joel rubin <sighet2000@yahoo.com> 
To: moishe@langsam.com 

DEAR MOISHE:

THANKS FOR YOUR RESPONSE,

1} MY MAILING ADDRESS IS: 

JOEL RUBIN

162 LEE AVE.

BROOKLYN N. Y. 11211

2} MY FAX NUMBER IS (718)624-1588

3} MY LINEAGE FROM RACHEL {RACHAL} IS AS FOLLOW;

JOEL RUBIN, SON OF YERACHMIEL SAUL RUBIN, SON OF BETZALEL YONU RUBIN {may he 
rest in peace},SON OF PINCHAS ZVI RUBIN & HIS WIFE RACHEL {UHR} DAUGHTER OF 
R' ELYUKIM UHR.

4} I DON'T KNOW TO MUCH ABOUT THE FIRST WIFE OF R' ELYUKIM, BUT THEIR IS SOME 
GRAND-CHILDREN LIVING IN LAKWOOD NEW JERSEY, AND IN ISREAL, I CAN TRY TO CONTACT 
THEM.

5} IF POSSIBLE PLEASE CONTACT THE KOSICE ARCHIVES FOR MORE INFORMATION THAT CAN 
BE A GRADE HELP.

THANK YOU 

HAVE A NICE DAY

JOEL RUBIN
_____________________________________________________________________
Date: Wed, 5 Sep 2001 16:00:55 -0700 (PDT) 
From: joel rubin <sighet2000@yahoo.com> 
Subject: UHR FAMILY TREE 
To: MOISHE@LANGSAM.COM 


DEAR MOISHE:

THANK YOU FOR YOUR FAX.

FIRST, I'D LIKE TO TELL YOU THAT THE NAME OF MY GRANDMOTHER THE DAUGHTER 
OF R' ELYUKIM IS "RECHEL" NOT "RACHEL".

ALSO, I'M STILL WONDERING HOW YOU ARE SO SURE THAT MY GRANDFATHER R' 
ELYUKIM UHR IS THE SON OF R' YAAKOV URI ?

HERE IS SOME INFORMATION ABOUT MY GREAT GRAND-PARENTS & THEIR FAMILY:

R' PINCHAS TZVI {HAKOHAN} RUBIN, WAS THE SON OF R' MENACHEM MUNISH 
{HAKOHAN} RUBIN WHO LIVED IN SOMOTOR (ITS IN SLOVAKIA NEAR THE HUNGARIAN 
BORDER, THE RUBIN FAMILY THEIR WAS WELL-KNOWN)R' PINCHAS HERSH WAS BORN 
"NOV. 7 1886" .

HE MARRIED "RECHEL" THE DAUGHTER OF R' ELYUKIM UHR, THEY LIVED IN KOSICE, 
AND THEY HAD "9" CHILDREN, THEY BOTH PERISHED IN THE GAS CHAMBERS OF 
AUSCHWITZ POLAND, IN THE DAY OF "MAY 22 1944" .

THE FOLLOWING IS A LIST OF THEIR "9" CHILDREN:

BOYS:

1} YECHIEL MECHEL / 2} ELYUKIM / {they are still alive} 

3} YITZCHOK ISSAC / 4} BETZALEL YONU / 5} MOISHE AVROHOM / 6} MORDCHA 
DOV /

GIRLS:

7} SHAVA RACHEL / 8} MIRYAM GOLDA / 9} CHAYA SURA / .

AS SOON AS I WILL HAVE MORE INFORMATION, I WILL TRY TO SEND THEM TO 
YOU AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.

A HAPPY & HEALTHY NEW YEAR

                                           HAVE A NICE DAY!!!

                                                    JOEL RUBIN

P.S. THE FAX NUMBER A GAVE'D YOU IS A TEL/FAX, BUT YOU CAN ALWAYS FAX BY 
PRESSING "START" 
_____________________________________________________________________


I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA

Last updated 9/13/01
